gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To defend someone or something
pomeni ukrepati, da bi nekoga zavarovali.

seg.quote: The village had to defend itself against raiders.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To defend someone or something
pomeni govoriti v zagovor človeka, ki so ga kritizirali.

seg.quote: The bank has defended its actions in these cases.

sense.def:
Kadar odvetnik
defends a person in court
, poskuša na sodišču dokazati, da so obtožbe na račun neke osebe neresnične ali da je imela razlog za zločin.

Kadar športni prvak
defends his or her title
, igra ali tekmuje proti nekomu, ki bo novi prvak, če bo zmagal.
